text: hananim-i yeeonjadeulgwa seong-yag-eulhasa seongseowa jihyeleul jusyeossnola geu leon hu han seonjijaga jinliwa hamkke neohuiege onani geuleul midgo geuleul doulgeos-ila ie hwagsinhaneunyo neo huideul-e naelin naui seong-yag-eul jikineu nyo geudeul-i daedabhayeo galodoe hwagsin hanaida geuleomyeon jeung-eonhala naega jeung-in-eulosseo neohuiwa hamkke iss-eul geos ila
